traits.name: Cunning Action
entries: On each of its turns, Samara can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

traits.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: The spy deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Samara that isn't {@condition incapacitated} and Samara doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The spy makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 5 (1d6 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
